plot: Lilo Gottschick is in Michael Döring's hands. She threatens to kill him if he ever touches another woman. Clemens learns from Daniel how Vera is doing. Daniel discovers Tina in a photo in Clemens' office. He gives her an interview date for a commercial. In front of the agency, Tina is sprayed with dirt from top to bottom by a car. She insults the driver without suspecting that it is the great Löpelmann himself.
